QUEENSLAND Chief Health Officer Jeannette Young has declared three areas in Victoria as COVID-19 hot spots, forcing anyone who has travelled to the state from those regions to self-quarantine for 14 days.

articles.author: Claire Bickers
articles.title: Plan to tackle feared virus suicide spike - Balonne Beacon
articles.description: Medical experts warn Australia’s suicide rate could increase by more than a quarter and could continue for years in the wake of coronavirus.
articles.content:
An action plan to tackle Australia's looming mental health crisis will be unveiled by political leaders tomorrow amid fears the suicide rate could grow by 25 per cent as a result of coronavirus.

articles.title: Hotel worker praised for preventing coronavirus outbreak - Yahoo News Australia
articles.description: Western Australia's Health Minister has praised the actions of a hotel worker who tested positive for COVID-19.
articles.content:
A man who worked at a Perth hotel being used for quarantining international arrivals has potentially prevented a new coronavirus cluster by heeding health advice.

articles.title: Coronavirus updates LIVE: More than 900000 COVID-19 tests carried out in Australia as cases surpass 4.2 million worldwide, nation's death toll stands at 98 - The Sydney Morning Herald
